item.title: House Republicans eye FEMA fund overhaul ahead of high-stakes hearing on Helene recovery
item.description: Rep. Gary Palmer is leading new legislation to replenish FEMA disaster relief funding using unspent funds the agency has elsewhere.

item.title: Trump naming cabinet officials at 'warp speed,' far head of first term pace
item.description: President-elect Trump is far ahead of his pace from eight years ago when it comes to staffing his second administration, and he's making his picks fas...

item.title: Why Trump is sticking with Gaetz, Hegseth despite new accusations – and his 'Morning Joe' meeting
item.description: President-elect Trump is standing by all of his Executive Branch nominations – even the ones stirring up the most controversy. Taking a step back, it'...

item.title: Pennsylvania Dem Gov. Josh Shapiro sides with state supreme court ruling not to count certain mail-in ballots
item.description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro came out Monday and sided with the state's supreme court over a ruling about the counting of mail-in ballots.

item.title: Senate GOP initiates Thune-engineered slow down as Schumer looks to stack judicial votes
item.description: Republicans sought to delay Democrats' cloture filings on Monday as they try to quickly confirm Biden judges in the lame duck session.
